chara.textHome: Happy New Year!
I hope we can have another good year.

Let's support each other
and make it a great one.

Wow... The shrine is packed with people,
even this early.
Oh well... Let's just relax and take our time!
Want to stop by one of the food stalls?
Yachiyo cooked a New Year's feast for us!
Would you like some too?
Oh, I helped her make it...
I'm especially proud of the kelp rolls!
Ugh... My body feels really cold now...

Would you like to drink something hot
when we get home?
It's New Year's, so maybe some amazake?

It's getting late, I'll have to change out
of this kimono pretty soon...

But I don't get to wear one every day, so
would be okay if I kept it on a little longer?
Hmm... I'm getting hungry...

But, no! I shouldn't...
New Year's dishes are so high in calories...

Then again, Yachiyo's cooking
is really good...
*Groan*

I'd love for things to stay this bright
and cheery... But I know they won't.

It's up to me to make sure everyone
can enjoy their New Year's Day in peace!

Yes, We should make sure we're
extra ready to go to Endless Mirrors.
We can't start off the year on the wrong foot!

I sent my mom and dad
a "Happy New Year!" message.

It'll be fun to ask them about what
New Year's is like overseas when
they come back.

Mom made me a special purse
to go with my kimono.

And guess what, there was
a hand-made hair clip inside!

She never said anything
so it was a big surprise!
My New Year's resolution...?

There's so many I could make,
but... when it comes to cooking,
I want to learn how to season food just right!

Everything I make turns out bland
no matter what I try...

Yachiyo looks even more grown up
in a kimono, don't you think?
D-do I look a little bit more grown up, too?
It's not much, but I'm also wearing makeup!

To top off the Chinese feast, Tsuruno gave
us Chinese soup and rice cakes too!

The whole line-up was glistening
with greasy goodness...

We played all sorts of New Year's games
at the Mikazuki Villa.

Felicia is really good at the game
where you hit blocks with a small hammer,
she was really into it.

The funny thing about New Year's TV shows
is you always end up watching them.

I'm not sure when Sana sat down next to me,
but the two of us vegged out and watched
them for two hours straight.

Years ago, I wanted to show Ui how to
fly a kite when she was in the hospital,
so I tried flying one out her window.

The string got tangled up, it was a big mess,
but Ui seemed to really like it!

Ah, there you are!
Phew, I got worried when you disappeared...

It's getting pretty crowded, so why don't we
hold hands so we don't get separated again?
